an3.18:4.1: “Mendicants, if wanderers who follow another path were to ask you:
an3.18:4.2: ‘Reverend, do you live the spiritual life with the ascetic Gotama so that you can be reborn in the realm of the gods?’
an3.18:4.3: Being questioned like this, wouldn’t you be horrified, embarrassed, and disgusted?”
an3.18:4.5: “So it seems that you are horrified, embarrassed, and disgusted by divine lifespan, beauty, happiness, fame, and power.
an3.18:4.6: How much more then should you be horrified, embarrassed, and disgusted by bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind.”
